activitypoint_error_message_admincp_adju: No user selected to execute actions
activitypoint_error_message_can_not_redu: The points you want to reduce is over the maximum points
activitypoint_current_points_information: Total activity points of each user.
activitypoint_total_earned_information: Total activity points which user earned from defined actions.
activitypoint_total_received_information: Total activity points which user received from Admin, friends or selling on other apps.
activitypoint_total_bought_information: Total activity points which user bought from packages.
activitypoint_total_spent_information: Total activity points which user used to exchange on Apps.
activitypoint_total_sent_information: Total activity points which user sent to friends or user had been subtracted points from Admin for personality reason.
activitypoint_error_message_can_not_send: The points you want to send is over the maximum points
activitypoint_admincp_title_title: These settings are applied on each usergroup. So, please choose usergroup first
activitypoint_validate_setting_message: Invalid value of field "{field}" in setting "{title}"
activitypoint_validate_comparision: Value of field "{field_one}" must smaller or equal than Value of field "{field_two}" in setting "{title}"
activitypoint_introduce_how_to_earn_titl: How to earn activity point ? Click here to get more information
activitypoint_introduce_point_package_ti: You can sell Point Packages and set price and provide some discount for a large packages.
activitypoint_admincp_transaction_introd: This page lists all of transactions that users created.
activitypoint_admincp_points_introduce: This page shows total and others of activity points each members in your community.
activitypoint_setting_image_package_erro: "Maximum size for image package" must equal or greater than 0
activitypoint_max_file_size_notice: Maximum file size for package is {number} KB. Please choose another image.
activitypoint_permission_purchase_packag: You are not allowed to buy activity point packages. Click here to learn how you can earn points.
activitypoint_sent_points_action: You gifted points for {full_name}
activitypoint_use_points_to_buy: You used points to buy an item
activitypoint_subtract_points_when_delet: The system retrieves points when you deleted an item
activitypoint_do_not_permission: You do not enough permission to do this action
activitypoint_can_not_adjust_points: Can not adjust points now. Maybe you got max sent points for period time or at least one user has 0 point if you want to subtract points.
activitypoint_no_setting_available: No available actions for getting points
activitypoint_cannot_send_negative_point: The points you want to send must be bigger than 0
activitypoint_invalid_points_add_package: "Points" must be a number and greater than 0
activitypoint_invalid_price_add_package: Provide a invalid price for package
activitypoint_total_retrieved_informatio: Total activity points which user deleted items.
activitypoint_from_date_must_be_smaller_: "From Date" must be smaller than "To Date".
points_feed_postonwall: Post a new status on wall
points_feed_postonotherprofile: Post a new status on other profile
activitypoint_point_in_currency: Total money is corresponding to that points.
